testcase.name: main() > should fetch weather data and update the README successfully
main() > should log a warning if no changes were made to the README
main() > should handle errors during weather data fetch
main() > should handle errors during README update
main() > should handle errors during environment variable validation
main() > should handle unhandled errors in the main function
main() > should handle unknown errors in the main function
main() > should use custom README path if provided in environment
main() > should report changes status to GitHub Actions
main() > should report no changes status to GitHub Actions
fetchWeatherData() > should correctly convert UTC timestamp to Dhaka time
fetchWeatherData() > should fetch weather data successfully
